adiscour.se
an exploration of discursive practice and production
"Whoever produces in the act of consumption has no real acquaintance with books."
Friedrich Kittler, Aufschreibsysteme 1800/1900 This space is an experiment and possibly an aberation. It is a space of indeterminate written discourse "on the network" or maybe "in network" or perhaps "through the network". Within the browser portal units of discourse from books and articles and types of references are mixed with units of the mind. Rather than some impulse towards finding a clear and thoroughly organized result from various submissions, the discontinuous aggregate is quite the point - a mediation without composition.
